mapper.select: select r.user_id, p.product_name, r.product_code, r.title, r.content, r.review_seq from review r, product p where user_id = #{loginId} and r.product_code = p.product_code
mapper.insert: insert into review ( user_id, product_code, title, content ) values ( #{userId}, #{productCode}, #{title}, #{content} );
mapper.delete: delete from review where review_seq = #{reviewSeq} and user_id = #{userId};
